#!/bin/bash
sed -i "s/localhost /localhost db-a.ca-labs.com /" /etc/hosts
echo '192.168.11.10 db-b.ca-labs.com' >> /etc/hosts
echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/amazon/2013.03/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' > /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-org-3.4.repo
yum install -y mongodb-org
sed -i 's/  bindIp:/#  bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
echo 'replication:' >> /etc/mongod.conf
echo '  replSetName: ca-labs' >> /etc/mongod.conf
service mongod start
chkconfig mongod on
mongo --eval 'rs.initiate({_id:"ca-labs",members:[{_id:0,host:"db-a.ca-labs.com:27017"}]})'
mongo --eval 'rs.add("db-b.ca-labs.com")'

#!/bin/vbash
config=ibgp-config.bash
echo "#!/bin/vbash" > $config
echo "source /opt/vyatta/etc/functions/script-template" >> $config
echo configure >> $config
set protocols ospf area 0.0.0.0 network 192.168.0.100/32 >> $config
set protocols ospf area 0.0.0.0 network 192.168.0.0/24 >> $config
set protocols ospf parameters router-id 192.168.0.100 >> $config
set protocols ospf passive-interface eth0 >> $config
set protocols bgp 65000 neighbor 192.168.1.100 remote-as 65000 >> $config
set protocols bgp 65000 parameters router-id 192.168.0.100 >> $config
echo commit >> $config
echo save >> $config
echo exit >> $config
vbash $config
